Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Config(java.lang.String filename)
      Constructor that creates a new Config object using the data of a provided config file, and changes the config settings within the file if the user chooses.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getDie_sides()
      Getter for the number of sides for a die
      int getNum_dice()
      Getter for the number of dice in a hand
      int getRolls_per_round()
      Getter for the number of rolls per round

      • Config

        public Config(java.lang.String filename)
        Constructor that creates a new Config object using the data of a provided config file, and changes the config settings within the file if the user chooses.

        filename - String containing the name of the config file
